references.paper_title: Private stochastic convex optimization: Optimal rates in l₁ geometry
references.reason: This paper initiated the study of private stochastic convex optimization under user-level differential privacy, establishing optimal rates and laying the groundwork for subsequent research.

references.paper_title: User-level differentially private stochastic convex optimization: Efficient algorithms with optimal rates
references.reason: This paper provides the most closely related prior work, offering improved algorithms but still falling short of optimal runtime complexities.

references.paper_title: User-level private stochastic convex optimization with optimal rates
references.reason: This paper provides a significant improvement over previous algorithms, but still has restrictive assumptions, making it less applicable to general settings.

references.paper_title: Private stochastic convex optimization: optimal rates in linear time
references.reason: This paper provides a benchmark for linear time algorithms in the item-level DP setting, establishing an important comparison point for the user-level DP setting considered here.
This paper provides another recent attempt to solve this problem but does not provide polynomial-time algorithms.
